title: Edu ministry providing meal to 32000 students of 102 ICT schools
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 03 (APP):Ministry of Federal Education and Professional Training on Monday said that National Nutrition Initiative was gaining momentum daily, with 102 schools covered for school meal programs in Islamabad.
According to the Ministry, under meal initiative more than 32,000 students were daily getting nutritious meals in their schools.
These meals are found to be beneficial in attracting Out of School Children to regualr schooling and reducing dropouts thus, increasing daily attendance and retention.
As per details the number of children in schools benefiting from school meals program including Islamabad Model School F-6/3 Kohsar Market 400 children getting meal under (School Khana Program), Islamabad Model School G-9/1 185, Islamabad Model School F-6/4 St # 46, 400, Islamabad Model School F-10/2, 300, Islamabad Model School G-10/2 (1) 340, Islamabad Model School G-10/2 (2), 270, Islamabad Model School Sihala Kurd 180,
Islamabad Model School G-8/1 (1) 359, Islamabad Model School G8/1 (2) 250,
Islamabad Model School G-8/1 (3) 350, Islamabad Model School G-10/1, 555, Islamabad Model School G-11/1, 760
Islamabad Model School I9/1 (1) 425, Islamabad Model School I9/1 (2), 431, Islamabad Model School I-9/4 (1) 460, Islamabad Model School I9/4 (2) 430, Islamabad Model School G-9/3 (1) 262, Islamabad Model School G-9/4 (1) 255, Islamabad Model School G-9/4 (2) 136, Islamabad Model School G-9/3 (2)483, Islamabad Model School F10/4, 340, Islamabad Model School G-9/3 (3)260, Islamabad Model School I-10/1 (2) 370, Islamabad Model School F-10/1 (1) 240, Islamabad Model School G-8/3 (PIMS) 140, Islamabad Model School G-8/2 (2) 220, Islamabad Model School G-8/2 (1) 309, Islamabad Model School G-8/4 (1)341,Islamabad Model School G-8/4 (2)305, Islamabad Model School Sohan Boys 525, Islamabad Model School Swan Garden245, Islamabad Model School CBR Town 293, Islamabad Model School Lohi Bhair 335, Islamabad Model School PWD299, Islamabad Model School Dhok Mai Nawab 210, Islamabad Model School Darwala 55, Islamabad Model School AIOU 168, Islamabad Model School G-10/4, 170, Islamabad Model School Boora Bangial boys 145, Islamabad Model School G-7/2, 370, Islamabad Model School E-7/4, 128, Islamabad Model School G6/1-4490, Islamabad Model School G-6/1-1, 520, Islamabad Model School Bora Bangial Girls 180, Islamabad Model School Gangota 170, Islamabad Model School Sihala Girls 230, Islamabad Model School Sihala Boys 60,
Islamabad Model School Sihala Mirzian Boys 188, Islamabad Model School Sihala Mirzian Girls 270,
